articles.title: Google Maps will help you calculate the travel fare, by showing the toll prices now - India TV News
articles.description: Google Maps will collect the information from the local authorities to estimate the toll price. It has been reported that the total fare will be estimated based on factors like- the cost of the toll pass used by the traveller or the supportive payment methods.
